alert.note: Alert for Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 6:05AM MST until February 02 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of generally 1 to 2 inches. Intense snow and gusty easterly winds will develop this evening. Low visibility, blowing snow, and icy roadways will impact travel conditions. * WHERE...Missoula/Bitterroot Valleys. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 3 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
